verses.text_plain: For Zion’s sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem’s sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth.
verses.verse_html: 1For Zion’s sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem’s sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth.

tokens.text: sake will I not hold my peace

verses.text_plain: And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the Lord shall name.
verses.verse_html: 2And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the Lord shall name.

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the Lord, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.
verses.verse_html: 3Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the Lord, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.

tokens.text: Thou shalt also be a crown

verses.text_plain: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi–bah, and thy land Beulah: for the Lord delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.
verses.verse_html:
4Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi–bah, and thy land Beulah: for the Lord delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married. ▼
▼ Hephzi–bah: that is, My delight is in her
 , ▼
▼ Beulah: that is, Married

tokens.text: Thou shalt no more be termed

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Hephzi–bah: that is, My delight is in her
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Hephzi–bah: that is, My delight is in her
▼ Beulah: that is, Married

verses.text_plain: For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.
verses.verse_html:
5For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee. ▼
▼ as the…: Heb. with the joy of the bridegroom

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as the…: Heb. with the joy of the bridegroom
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as the…: Heb. with the joy of the bridegroom

verses.text_plain: I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, which shall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the Lord, keep not silence,
verses.verse_html:
6I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, which shall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the Lord, keep not silence, ▼
▼ make…: or, are the Lord’s remembrancers

footnotes.body_text: ▼ make…: or, are the Lord’s remembrancers
footnotes.body_html: ▼ make…: or, are the Lord’s remembrancers

verses.text_plain: And give him no rest, till he establish, and till he make Jerusalem a praise in the earth.
verses.verse_html:
7And give him no rest, till he establish, and till he make Jerusalem a praise in the earth. ▼
▼ rest: Heb. silence

verses.text_plain: The Lord hath sworn by his right hand, and by the arm of his strength, Surely I will no more give thy corn to be meat for thine enemies; and the sons of the stranger shall not drink thy wine, for the which thou hast laboured:
verses.verse_html:
8The Lord hath sworn by his right hand, and by the arm of his strength, Surely I will no more give thy corn to be meat for thine enemies; and the sons of the stranger shall not drink thy wine, for the which thou hast laboured: ▼
▼ Surely…: Heb. If I give, etc

tokens.text: for the which thou hast laboured

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Surely…: Heb. If I give, etc
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Surely…: Heb. If I give, etc

verses.text_plain: But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the Lord; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.
verses.verse_html: 9But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the Lord; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.

tokens.text: and they that have brought it together

verses.text_plain: Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.
verses.verse_html: 10Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.

verses.text_plain: Behold, the Lord hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him.
verses.verse_html:
11Behold, the Lord hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him. ▼
▼ work: or, recompence

verses.text_plain: And they shall call them, The holy people, The redeemed of the Lord: and thou shalt be called, Sought out, A city not forsaken.
verses.verse_html: 12And they shall call them, The holy people, The redeemed of the Lord: and thou shalt be called, Sought out, A city not forsaken.
